concept.title: View status change details of a Test Result

conbody.p: You can see the detailed information and description of a status change once the status has been modified.
Select the Test Results tab, click on a Test Result ID, then select the Comments tab.
You can then check the following information:

ul.li: the name of the member who changed the status of a Test Result.
the history of that Test Result's status changes.
the reason for each status change.
